"Welcome to XIO! These Terms and Conditions outline the rules and regulations for using our mobile application. By downloading, installing, or using XIO, you agree to comply with these Terms.If you do not agree, please refrain from using the app.
1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using XIO, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Policy. If you are using the app on behalf of a company or organization, you represent that you have the authority to bind that entity to these Terms.
2. Description of the Service XIO is designed to assist electric vehicle (EV) owners by providing features such as:
Locating Charging Stations: Find nearby EV charging stations based on your GPS location. Charging Session Tracking: Monitor and manage your charging sessions, including duration and costs. User Community Features: Connect with other EV users to share information and experiences. Alerts and Notifications: Receive real-time alerts for charging station availability and special offers.
3. User Permissions To provide the above services effectively, XIO requests certain permissions from your device:
GPS Location: Access to your GPS location is essential for identifying nearby charging stations and providing real-time updates. You can manage this permission in your device settings.
Contacts: This permission may be required to allow users to share information about charging stations with their contacts. You can opt out of this permission, but certain features may be limited.
Camera Access: If XIO includes QR code scanning for charging stations, we will request access to your camera.
Storage Access: To enhance user experience, we may need access to your device's storage for saving user preferences and session data.
By granting these permissions, you acknowledge that you understand how we will use the information collected and agree to provide access as necessary for the app’s functionality.
4. User Responsibilities As a user of XIO, you agree to:
Use the app only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. Provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration and keep your account information up to date. Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials and not share them with others. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security. Not engage in any activity that disrupts or interferes with the app’s functionality or other users' access. 5. Data Collection and Usage We are committed to protecting your privacy. Our data collection practices are detailed in our Privacy Policy. We may collect:
Personal Information: This includes your name, email address, and other contact information when you register or use certain features. Location Data: To provide personalized services, we collect location data when the app is in use. Usage Data: We track how the app is used to improve our services and user experience. By using XIO, you consent to our data collection and usage practices as outlined in our Privacy Policy.
